summary: This document is an email chain regarding the case USA v. Maxwell, notifying parties of a removal hearing scheduled for July 2, 2020, at 3:30 PM via video conference before Magistrate Judge Andrea K. Johnstone. It includes an attachment reference to a detention memorandum filed in SDNY.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the case USA v. Maxwell, with a removal hearing scheduled.

persons.name: Andrea K. Johnstone
persons.context: Presiding over the removal hearing via video conference for Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Removal Hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A removal hearing scheduled via video conference before Magistrate Judge Andrea K. Johnstone.

keyFacts: A removal hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell was scheduled for July 2, 2020, at 3:30 PM via video conference.
The hearing was to be presided over by Magistrate Judge Andrea K. Johnstone in the District of New Hampshire.
A detention memorandum was filed in the Southern District of New York (SDNY) in relation to the case.
